DISCORD_PREFIX.description: (string) The bot's prefix. Used for the commands.

DISCORD_OWNER_ID.description: (string) The ID of the bot's owner.

DISCORD_OWNER_REPORTING.description: (bool) Whether the bot should send error reports to the owner via DM when a command errors.

DISCORD_PRESENCE_REFRESH_INTERVAL.description: (int) The time interval in ms in which the bot updates its presence. If set to null the presence auto update will be disabled.
